text: I will make mention of the lovingkindnesses of Jehovah, <FI>and<Fi> the praises of Jehovah, according to all that Jehovah hath bestowed on us, and the great goodness toward the house of Israel, which he hath bestowed on them according to his mercies, and according to the multitude of his lovingkindnesses.
name: Isaiah 63:7
